mapper.select: select L_NO lNo,L_CATEGORY lCategory,L_TITLE lTitle,L_CONTENT lContent,DATE_FORMAT(L_REG_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')as lRegDate from haeyum.tbl_lecture where L_ID=#{id} order by L_NO desc limit #{reqIndex},10

select L_NO lNo, M_NO mNo, L_TITLE lTitle, L_CONTENT lContent, L_ID lId, L_category lCategory, DATE_FORMAT(L_REG_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')as lRegDate from tbl_lecture where l_no in (select r.l_no from (select v.l_no as l_no from (select w_no, v_no from haeyum.tbl_watch_list where w_id = #{id}) w, tbl_video v where v.v_no = w.v_no group by v.l_no) r) limit #{reqIndex},10
select count(r.l_no) from (select v.l_no as l_no from (select w_no, v_no from haeyum.tbl_watch_list where w_id = #{id}) w, tbl_video v where v.v_no = w.v_no group by v.l_no) r

select p.L_NO lNo,p.V_NO vNo,p.P_ID pId,p.P_NAME pName,p.P_PRICE pPrice,p.P_COUNT pCount,p.P_CONTENT pContent, s.SELL_COUNT sellCount,s.SELL_NO sellNo,s.SELL_ID sellId, DATE_FORMAT(P_REG_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')as pRegDate from haeyum.tbl_product p,haeyum.tbl_sell s where p.P_NO =s.P_NO and s.SELL_ID=#{id} order by sellNo desc limit #{reqIndex},10
select count(s.SELL_NO) sellNo from haeyum.tbl_product p,haeyum.tbl_sell s where p.P_NO =s.P_NO and s.SELL_ID=#{id}

select b.BUY_NO buyNo,b.BUY_COUNT buyCount,p.P_NAME pName,p.P_PRICE pPrice,p.P_CONTENT pContent, DATE_FORMAT(BUY_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')as buyDate from haeyum.tbl_product p,haeyum.tbl_buy b where p.P_NO=b.P_NO and BUY_ID=#{id} order by buyNo desc limit #{reqIndex},10
select count(b.BUY_NO) buyNo from haeyum.tbl_product p,haeyum.tbl_buy b where p.P_NO=b.P_NO and BUY_ID=#{id}
select count(*) from haeyum.tbl_fav_video f,haeyum.tbl_lecture l where l.L_NO=f.L_NO and FAV_ID=#{id}

select l.l_NO lNo,l.L_TITLE lTitle,l.L_CONTENT lContent,l.L_CATEGORY lCategory,v.I_REAL_FILE_NAME lRealFileName from haeyum.tbl_fav_video f,haeyum.tbl_lecture l,haeyum.tbl_video v where l.L_NO=f.L_NO and FAV_ID=#{id} having min(V_NO) order by lNo desc limit #{start},#{end}
